ud1.10:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ud1.10:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bāhiyo dārucīriyo suppārake paṭivasati samuddatīre sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
ud1.10:1.4: Atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
ud1.10:1.5: “ye kho keci loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”ti.
ud1.10:2.1: Atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa purāṇasālohitā devatā anukampikā atthakāmā bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena bāhiyo dārucīriyo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ etadavoca:
ud1.10:2.2: “neva kho tvaṃ, bāhiya, arahā, nāpi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno.
ud1.10:2.3: Sāpi te paṭipadā natthi yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti.
ud1.10:3.1: “Atha ke carahi sadevake loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā”ti?
ud1.10:3.2: “Atthi, bāhiya, uttaresu janapadesu sāvatthī nāma nagaraṃ.
ud1.10:3.3: Tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho.
ud1.10:3.4: So hi, bāhiya, bhagavā arahā ceva arahattāya ca dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
ud1.10:4.1: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo tāya devatāya saṃvejito tāvadeva suppārakamhā pakkāmi.
ud1.10:4.2: Sabbattha ekarattiparivāsena yena sāvatthī jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
ud1.10:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti.
ud1.10:4.4: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
ud1.10:4.5: “kahaṃ nu kho, bhante, etarahi bhagavā viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho?
ud1.10:4.6: Dassanakāmamhā mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
ud1.10:5.1: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo taramānarūpo jetavanā nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā addasa bhagavantaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ pāsādikaṃ pasādanīyaṃ santindriyaṃ santamānasaṃ uttamadamathasamathamanuppattaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ yatindriyaṃ nāgaṃ.
ud1.10:5.2: Disvāna yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pāde sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud1.10:5.4: desetu sugato dhammaṃ, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
ud1.10:5.5: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ etadavoca:
ud1.10:5.6: “akālo kho tāva, bāhiya, antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhamhā piṇḍāyā”ti.
ud1.10:6.1: Dutiyampi kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud1.10:6.2: “dujjānaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhante, bhagavato vā jīvitantarāyānaṃ, mayhaṃ vā jīvitantarāyānaṃ.
ud1.10:6.4: desetu sugato dhammaṃ, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
ud1.10:6.5: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ etadavoca:
ud1.10:6.6: “akālo kho tāva, bāhiya, antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhamhā piṇḍāyā”ti.
ud1.10:7.1: Tatiyampi kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud1.10:7.2: “dujjānaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhante, bhagavato vā jīvitantarāyānaṃ, mayhaṃ vā jīvitantarāyānaṃ.
ud1.10:7.4: desetu sugato dhammaṃ, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
ud1.10:8.2: ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṃ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
ud1.10:8.4: Yato kho te, bāhiya, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṃ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena;
ud1.10:8.5: yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tena tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha;
ud1.10:8.6: yato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tattha, tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena.
ud1.10:9.1: Atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa bhagavato imāya saṅkhittāya dhammadesanāya tāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
ud1.10:10.1: Atha kho bhagavā bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ iminā saṃkhittena ovādena ovaditvā pakkāmi.
ud1.10:10.2: Atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesi.
ud1.10:11.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nagaramhā nikkhamitvā addasa bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ kālaṅkataṃ;
ud1.10:12.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīrakaṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā nīharitvā jhāpetvā thūpañcassa katvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
ud1.10:12.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
ud1.10:12.3: “daḍḍhaṃ, bhante, bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīraṃ, thūpo cassa kato.
ud1.10:13.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
ud1.10:16.1: Ayampi udāno vutto bhagavatā iti me sutanti.
